import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {FormGroup, FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.css'] }) export class RegistrationComponent { constructor(){} ngOnInit():void{ } }
